languages.text: "Есть зло, что пересекает пределы верности своему народу. Что станет с Лилэтан, если ты дозволишь врагу всего сущего жить среди своих подданных? Как долго изуродованный мир будет оставаться верным твоему {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуму{/g}, прежде чем станет бездной, исторгающей слуг Сай'лантреш?"

traits.locale_text: "Есть зло, что пересекает пределы верности своему народу. Что станет с Лилэтан, если ты дозволишь врагу всего сущего жить среди своих подданных? Как долго изуродованный мир будет оставаться верным твоему Империуму, прежде чем станет бездной, исторгающей слуг Сай'лантреш?"

languages.text: "Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} before she becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"
languages.original_text: "Есть зло, что пересекает пределы верности своему народу. Что станет с Лилэтан, если ты дозволишь врагу всего сущего жить среди своих подданных? Как долго изуродованный мир будет оставаться верным твоему {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуму{/g}, прежде чем станет бездной, исторгающей слуг Сай'лантреш?"

traits.locale_text: "Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your Imperium before it becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"

"Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your Imperium before it becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"

"Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your Imperium before it becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"

"Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} before she becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"

languages.text: 「邪心が種への忠義を上回ることはある。全生物の敵が身内に紛れ込んでいるのを許しておけば、リラエタンはどうなる？ヴィステンツァがセランスレッシュの従者を生む裂け目となるまで、この引き裂かれた星が{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に忠誠を誓い続ける期間は知れているだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} before she becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: 「邪心が種への忠義を上回ることはある。全生物の敵が身内に紛れ込んでいるのを許しておけば、リラエタンはどうなる？ヴィステンツァがセランスレッシュの従者を生む裂け目となるまで、この引き裂かれた星が{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に忠誠を誓い続ける期間は知れているだろう？」

languages.text: “同族之间的忠诚，与某些邪恶之物相比不值一提。如果你允许宇宙万物的大敌与你的臣民为伍，那莉莱赞会变成什么样子？再过多久，这个残缺不全的世界就会放弃对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的忠诚，沦为赛·兰斯雷什仆从的混沌深渊？”
languages.original_text: "Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} before she becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: “同族之间的忠诚，与某些邪恶之物相比不值一提。如果你允许宇宙万物的大敌与你的臣民为伍，那莉莱赞会变成什么样子？再过多久，这个残缺不全的世界就会放弃对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的忠诚，沦为赛·兰斯雷什仆从的混沌深渊？”

languages.text: «Algunas maldades trascienden la lealtad a la propia especie. ¿Qué será del Lilaethan si permites que el enemigo de toda la creación viva entre tus súbditos? ¿Cuánto tiempo seguirá siendo leal este mundo mutilado a tu {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} antes de convertirse en un abismo del que emerjan los siervos de Sai'lanthresh?».
languages.original_text: "Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} before she becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: «Algunas maldades trascienden la lealtad a la propia especie. ¿Qué será del Lilaethan si permites que el enemigo de toda la creación viva entre tus súbditos? ¿Cuánto tiempo seguirá siendo leal este mundo mutilado a tu {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} antes de convertirse en un abismo del que emerjan los siervos de Sai'lanthresh?».

languages.text: "Etwas Böses überlagert die Loyalität gegenüber den eigenen Leuten. Was wird aus Lileath, wenn Ihr dem Feind aller Schöpfung gestattet, unter Euren Untertanen zu leben? Wie lange bleibt diese verstümmelte Welt Eurem {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} noch treu ergeben, bevor sie zu einem Abgrund wird, aus dem Sai'lanthreshs Diener hervorbrechen?"
languages.original_text: "Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} before she becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: "Etwas Böses überlagert die Loyalität gegenüber den eigenen Leuten. Was wird aus Lileath, wenn Ihr dem Feind aller Schöpfung gestattet, unter Euren Untertanen zu leben? Wie lange bleibt diese verstümmelte Welt Eurem {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} noch treu ergeben, bevor sie zu einem Abgrund wird, aus dem Sai'lanthreshs Diener hervorbrechen?"

languages.text: « Parfois, le mal vous fait oublier toute loyauté envers vos semblables. Qu'adviendra-t-il de la lilaethan si vous laissez l'ennemie de la création vivre parmi vos sujets ? Combien de temps encore ce monde mutilé restera-t-il fidèle à votre {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} avant de se transformer en abîme béant laissant passer les serviteurs de Sai'lanthresh ? »
languages.original_text: "Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} before she becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: « Parfois, le mal vous fait oublier toute loyauté envers vos semblables. Qu'adviendra-t-il de la lilaethan si vous laissez l'ennemie de la création vivre parmi vos sujets ? Combien de temps encore ce monde mutilé restera-t-il fidèle à votre {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} avant de se transformer en faille béante laissant passer les serviteurs de Sai'lanthresh ? »

languages.text: "Bazı kötülükler, kişinin kendi türüne olan sadakatini bile aşar. Tüm yaratılışın düşmanının tebaan arasında yaşamasına izin verirsen Lilaethan'a ne olur? Bu mahvolmuş dünya, Sai'lanthresh'in hizmetkârlarına geçit olan bir yarığa dönüşmeden önce {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'una{/g} ne kadar sadık kalacak sence?"
languages.original_text: "Some evil transcends loyalty to one's own kind. What will become of the Lilaethan if you allow the enemy of all creation to live among your subjects? How long with this mutilated world remain loyal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} before she becomes a chasm bringing forth servants of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: "Bazı kötülükler, kişinin kendi türüne olan sadakatini bile aşar. Tüm yaratılışın düşmanının tebaan arasında yaşamasına izin verirsen Lilaethan'a ne olur? Bu mahvolmuş dünya, Sai'lanthresh'in hizmetkârlarına geçit olan bir yarığa dönüşmeden önce {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'una ne kadar sadık kalacak sence?"
